positions.subtitle: 180 Degrees Consulting IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: Selected to head a three-tier team of 50+ members for ensuring quality deliverables & client relations in coordination with other directors• Handled the student recruitment process of 600+ students & training process of 35+ new recruits by leading a team of 30+ consultants• Won the Best Consulting Project Silver Award in the APAC Region out of 70+ international branches; part of 10+ operational projects• Acquired 8+ clients by conducting 30+ meetings and making 100+ connects with leaders in the first operational year of the organization

experience.title: Product
experience.description: Coordinated directly with the CEO in strategic planning for possible integrations, product research, feasibility analysis and process optimization• Delivered Whatsapp CRM to 10+ clients by working on their requirements by creating flows and features for the Whatsapp Support Inbox • Assessed current features, analyzed the delta from competitors and suggested improvements in order to enhance the merchant experience• Collaborated with the design team to revamp the analytics UI to make it more structured, segmented, and action-oriented for merchants
experience.description_html: Coordinated directly with the CEO in strategic planning for possible integrations, product research, feasibility analysis and process optimization• Delivered Whatsapp CRM to 10+ clients by working on their requirements by creating flows and features for the Whatsapp Support Inbox • Assessed current features, analyzed the delta from competitors and suggested improvements in order to enhance the merchant experience• Collaborated with the design team to revamp the analytics UI to make it more structured, segmented, and action-oriented for merchants

experience.title: Product
experience.description: • Helped different D2C organisations by analysing their user behaviours and coming up with an appropriate recommendations  • Developed the audit processes to identify the root cause and Created various playbooks to smoothen the onboarding process• Attended client calls to understand their needs and created campaign flows around improving customer experience and resurrection• Created dashboards on metabase to track the success metrics for the existing Whatsapp Remarketing campaigns  • Made significant changes in the pre-existing Whatsapp Remarketing campaigns  to improve the conversion rates upto 5%
experience.description_html: • Helped different D2C organisations by analysing their user behaviours and coming up with an appropriate recommendations • Developed the audit processes to identify the root cause and Created various playbooks to smoothen the onboarding process• Attended client calls to understand their needs and created campaign flows around improving customer experience and resurrection• Created dashboards on metabase to track the success metrics for the existing Whatsapp Remarketing campaigns • Made significant changes in the pre-existing Whatsapp Remarketing campaigns to improve the conversion rates upto 5%

experience.title: Business Analyst
experience.description: • Analysed the sales performance and came up with relevant strategies in order to increase the revenues for the organization• Automated the cleaning process and created leaderboards leveraging different query functions in order to increase the efficiency by 2x• Created a lead optimization model that resulted in a 5% improvement in conversion rates while also preventing lead leakage• Projected revenues and targets by backtracking the previous performances along with creating MTDs for hiring

education.title: Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur
education.field: Biotechnology and Biochemical Engineering/ Financial Engineering

honors_and_awards.title: Gold | InterHall Case Study Competition
honors_and_awards.description: Led a team of 17 people and Secured 1st position among all the halls where we worked on the challenges & opportunities of India’s power grid in 21st century which included: Scenario of Current renewable energy and market policies around it to increase the renewable penetration, EV Growth Scenario, EV Charging Infrastructure and policies around it to boost EV adoption, Transactive Energy and policies around it in order to benefit customers

honors_and_awards.title: Silver | Managerial Olympiad
honors_and_awards.description: Tested on the following parameters: Problem-solving, Decision Making, Planning in this 2 round event and bagged 2nd position among 1000+ participants

honors_and_awards.title: Gold | Open IIT Case Study Competition
honors_and_awards.description: • Secured 1st position among 100+ participants in Open IIT Case Study Competition conducted by GymKhana • Tackled some of the major challenges that are faced in the traditional supply chain system for inventory management by suggesting additional features to an ML-based model that helped predict demand channels in order to streamline supplies

honors_and_awards.title: Gold | Improv Comedy, Inter Depatmental Literary Tournament
honors_and_awards.description: Secured 1st position in Improv Comedy at Inter Departmental Literary Tournament among 100+ participants from different departments
